data.lyric:
[ti:Black Hearted (Explicit)]
[ar:Polo G]
[al:Hall of Fame (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Black Hearted (Explicit) - Polo G
[00:02.89]Lyrics by：Taurus Bartlett
[00:05.78]Composed by：Taurus Bartlett
[00:08.68]D**n Mikey
[00:09.98]
[00:22.14]I heard he been dissin' on the squad we left his man sleep
[00:24.99]Duckin' silver bracelets be precautious when the feds sweep
[00:28.02]I want that brand new Bentley with the red seats
[00:30.45]My pops was there for me so I'll be d**ned I be a deadbeat uh
[00:34.25]When you said you loved me girl you scared me
[00:36.58]I'm fakin' smiles I'm hurt inside can't let my fans see
[00:39.30]They hear me talkin' but I don't think they understand me
[00:42.08]Checks and deposits young n***a swimmin' in them bands deep
[00:45.09]Head on a swivel opposition like a block away
[00:47.55]Teeth grittin' off them X pills so high that I couldn't concentrate
[00:50.56]I'm TimTim Gang don't add a K 'cause I don't think that's smart to say
[00:53.53]Rock out with that TEC might make a n***a do the Harlem Shake
[00:56.14]Make sure that grass low keep your pole and always watch for snakes
[00:59.16]Be careful who you trust 'cause they'll cross you like Tim Hardaway
[01:01.94]Impatient in the slums I couldn't afford to let my mama wait
[01:04.88]Long distance relationship with God so it get hard to pray
[01:07.74]You can't really plan what's meant to be I think they call it fate
[01:10.60]Like girl I love you but it's only so much I can tolerate
[01:13.23]Like girl I love you but it's only so much that my heart can take
[01:16.26]Like let's give it a rest girl I just wanna give my heart a break
[01:19.11]I heard he been dissin' on the squad we left his man sleep
[01:22.00]Duckin' silver bracelets be precautious when the feds sweep
[01:25.10]I want that brand new Bentley with the red seats
[01:27.66]My pops was there for me so I'll be d**ned I be a deadbeat uh
[01:31.36]When you said you loved me girl you scared me
[01:33.60]I'm fakin' smiles I'm hurt inside can't let my fans see
[01:36.35]They hear me talkin' but I don't think they understand me
[01:38.79]Uh uh uh uh
[01:39.38]Checks and deposits young n***a swimmin' in them bands deep
[01:42.02]Fee say like two hundred racks but the price keep goin' up
[01:45.42]I'm the hottest out the 'Raq they don't like me blowin' up
[01:48.34]Back against the wall no one to trust
[01:50.42]Ain't no limit in these streets can ride a bike you old enough
[01:53.27]Gotta fight no foldin' up lack pay the price you know what's up
[01:56.02]And when they say
[01:56.75]Who winnin
[01:57.25]B***h act like you know it's us
[01:58.82]From the soil you gotta share the same scars to roll with us
[02:01.69]Say it's smoke then roll it up off the Act' I'm pourin' up
[02:04.54]It's crackin' where I'm from watch what you throwin' up
[02:07.45]Just reckless gangbangin' no big homies over us
[02:10.35]'Fatuated by dollars yeah on that guap I got a crush
[02:13.18]Been racin' to millions the money talks give me a rush
[02:16.51]I heard he been dissin' on the squad we left his man sleep
[02:19.23]Duckin' silver bracelets be precautious when the feds sweep
[02:21.96]I want that brand new Bentley with the red seats
[02:24.80]My pops was there for me so I'll be d**ned I be a deadbeat uh
[02:28.51]When you said you loved me girl you scared me
[02:30.80]I'm fakin' smiles I'm hurt inside can't let my fans see
[02:33.56]They hear me talkin' but I don't think they understand me
[02:36.38]Checks and deposits young n***a swimmin' in them bands deep
data.trans:
[ti:Black Hearted (Explicit)]
[ar:Polo G]
[al:Hall of Fame (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.89]//
[00:05.78]//
[00:08.68]Mikey Beats制作
[00:09.98]
[00:22.14]我听说他对团队嗤之以鼻 我们让他的人酣然入睡
[00:24.99]我不想戴上银手铐 当联邦警察扫荡时 谨慎行事
[00:28.02]我想要那辆带着红色座椅 全新的宾利车
[00:30.45]我的爸爸一直陪伴着我 所以我会变得一无是处 我会变得游手好闲
[00:34.25]当你说你深爱着我时 女孩 你让我惶恐不安
[00:36.58]我强颜欢笑 我内心深处伤痕累累 不能让我的粉丝看见
[00:39.30]他们聆听着我说的话 但是我认为他们无法理解我
[00:42.08]支票和存款 年轻人在钞票里遨游
[00:45.09]转过头去 敌人在一个街区之外
[00:47.55]咀嚼着药片 兴奋不已 我无法集中注意力
[00:50.56]我是TimTim帮的成员 不要胡作非为 因为我认为这并不明智
[00:53.53]拿着TEC-9手枪招摇过市 也许会让人手舞足蹈
[00:56.14]确保草丛低矮 随身带着枪 永远提防那些卑鄙小人
[00:59.16]小心你信任的人 因为他们会背叛你 就像Tim Hardaway一样
[01:01.94]我在贫民窟里失去耐心 我无法负担让我妈妈等待的代价
[01:04.88]与上帝关系疏远 所以我难以祈祷
[01:07.74]你无法计划命中注定的一切 我想他们称之为命运
[01:10.60]女孩 我深爱着你 但是这是我能够承受的全部
[01:13.23]女孩 我深爱着你 但是这是我的心能够承受的全部
[01:16.26]让我们休息片刻 女孩 我只想让我的心好好休息一下
[01:19.11]我听说他对团队嗤之以鼻 我们让他的人酣然入睡
[01:22.00]我不想戴上银手铐 当联邦警察扫荡时 谨慎行事
[01:25.10]我想要那辆带着红色座椅 全新的宾利车
[01:27.66]我的爸爸一直陪伴着我 所以我会变得一无是处 我会变得游手好闲
[01:31.36]当你说你深爱着我时 女孩 你让我惶恐不安
[01:33.60]我强颜欢笑 我内心深处伤痕累累 不能让我的粉丝看见
[01:36.35]他们聆听着我说的话 但是我认为他们无法理解我
[01:38.79]//
[01:39.38]支票和存款 年轻人在钞票里遨游
[01:42.02]费用大概是二十万 但是价格水涨船高
[01:45.42]我是芝加哥最厉害的人 他们不喜欢我名声大噪
[01:48.34]走投无路 没有人能信任
[01:50.42]这些街道畅通无阻 等你长大了就可以骑自行车
[01:53.27]奋力拼搏 绝不退缩 不堪一击 付出代价 你知道来龙去脉
[01:56.02]当他们说
[01:56.75]谁大获全胜
[01:57.25]碧池 假装你知道这是我们的样子
[01:58.82]来自这片土地 你得与我们同甘共苦
[02:01.69]我说卷根烟 吞云吐雾 吞下药片 我酣快畅饮
[02:04.54]我的家乡危机四伏 注意你的一举一动
[02:07.45]只是鲁莽行事的混混 没有大佬庇护我们
[02:10.35]美元让我沉醉 我对钞票神魂颠倒
[02:13.18]我忙着赚钱 金钱无所不能 让我热血沸腾
[02:16.51]我听说他对团队嗤之以鼻 我们让他的人酣然入睡
[02:19.23]我不想戴上银手铐 当联邦警察扫荡时 谨慎行事
[02:21.96]我想要那辆带着红色座椅 全新的宾利车
[02:24.80]我的爸爸一直陪伴着我 所以我会变得一无是处 我会变得游手好闲
[02:28.51]当你说你深爱着我时 女孩 你让我惶恐不安
[02:30.80]我强颜欢笑 我内心深处伤痕累累 不能让我的粉丝看见
[02:33.56]他们聆听着我说的话 但是我认为他们无法理解我
[02:36.38]支票和存款 年轻人在钞票里遨游
